name.value: BgZ - XIS Server - Test - Scenario 1.15 - Serve BgZ LaboratoryTestResult resources of XXX_Rijn - JSON Format

description.value: Scenario 1.15 - Serve BgZ LaboratoryTestResult resources of XXX_Rijn
OAuth Token for current patient
Resource.id for Observation 1
Resource.id for Observation 2
Resource.id for Observation 3
Resource.id for Observation 4
Serve Observation resource(s) for last known chemistry related zib LaboratoryTestResult and include specimen and related observations
Test XIS server to serve Observation resources.
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.

Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Observation that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: LaboratoryTestResult-Observation-medmij-bgz-test-patA-labresult1)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Observation
Observation resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-LaboratoryTestResult-Observation'
Contains .text
Contains .identifier with .system and .value

Contains .status 'final' and with .extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/code-specification' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.4.16.1' and .code 'final' and .display. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails
Contains .status 'final'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-4 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .status.extension with url 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/code-specification' with .valueCodeableConcept with .coding with .system 'urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.2.4.3.11.60.40.4.16.1' and .code 'final' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-4 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '49581000146104' and .display
Contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://snomed.info/sct' and .code '275711006' and .display
Contains .code with .coding with .system 'http://loinc.org' and .code '30350-3' and .display
Contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .effectiveDateTime
Contains .comment 'Staphylococcus aureus aangetroffen'. This assert is set to warning because string comparisons can have many possible caveats
Contains .specimen with either .reference or .identifier and .display

Contains .related with .type 'has-member' and .target with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${LaboratoryTestResult-Observation-medmij-bgz-test-patA-labresult1-id}').related.where(type = 'has-member' and target.where((reference or identifier) and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .related.type 'has-member'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-12 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .related.target with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-12 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .related with .type 'has-member' and .target with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${LaboratoryTestResult-Observation-medmij-bgz-test-patA-labresult1-id}').related.where(type = 'has-member' and target.where((reference or identifier) and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .related.type 'has-member'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-13 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .related.target with either .reference or .identifier and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-13 checks if all children are present in the same parent
